= Shortcuts =

<C-[>   alias for <Esc>  

<*>     search for word on cursor

= Plugins =

== vim-surround ==

{prefix}{motion}{surround}
* prefix - cs/ds/ys
* motion - vim motion
* surround - surrounding characters such as [], {}, '', "", etc.

cs      change surroundings
ds      delete surroundings
ys      add surroundings
